name: Knightly Memories
effects: Increase ATK by 25% when equipped with a Great Sword
Increase ATK by 25% when equipped with a Helm

name: Knightly Memories
騎士記憶
기사의 기억
Souvenirs chevaleresques
Ritterliche Erinnerungen
Recuerdos hidalgos
desc_short: Boost ATK when equipped with a large sword or helm
提高裝備大劍頭盔時攻擊的數值
대검과 투구 장착 시 공격력 상승
Augmente l'ATT lorsqu'une grande épée ou un heaume est équipé
Erhöht ANG, wenn mit Langschwert oder Helm ausgerüstet.
Aumenta el ATQ al llevar espadas grandes o yelmos
